title: Could the ‘Mother of All Bombs’ Produce Radioactive Fallout?
subtitle: While we cannot prove a negative, there are few mechanisms by which a MOAB-like bomb would benefit by the addition of anything that would introduce radioactivity.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Massive Ordnance Air Blast, first used by the United States military in April 2017, is capable of releasing toxic radiation into the atmosphere on a global scale.
